# EsperancePaperviewEditor

Example (WIP) format (mfid: B9889DB4-9D9A-4857-841B-CD5EB8E72FF0, mfname: Photo Collection).

Example Html5 Embed:
```
<script id="esperance">var esperance = '{"legal":{},"publisher":{"id":"Fake_Publisher_Id","name":"Fake_Publisher","email":"Fake_Email","url":"Fake_WWW"},"microformat":{"mfid":"B9889DB4-9D9A-4857-841B-CD5EB8E72FF0","mfname":"Photo Collection"},"artifacts":{"title":"Collection Title","description":"Collection Description","images":[{"base64":"data:image/javascript;base64,","name":"Token Name 1","description":"Token Description 1"}]}}';</script>
```

Example Html5 Embed utilisation:
```
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
<head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <title>Paperview 'Photo Collection' Microformat</title>
    
    <script id="esperance">var esperance = '{"legal":{},"publisher":{"id":"Fake_Publisher_Id","name":"Fake_Publisher","email":"Fake_Email","url":"Fake_WWW"},"microformat":{"mfid":"B9889DB4-9D9A-4857-841B-CD5EB8E72FF0","mfname":"Photo Collection"},"artifacts":{"title":"Collection Title","description":"Collection Description","images":[{"base64":"data:image/javascript;base64,","name":"Token Name 1","description":"Token Description 1"}]}}';</script>

    <script>
    function Initialise()
    {
	    var esperancejson = JSON.parse(esperance);
	    document.getElementById("img").src = esperancejson.artifacts.images[0].base64;
	    document.getElementById("title").innerHTML = esperancejson.artifacts.title;
	    document.getElementById("description").innerHTML = esperancejson.artifacts.description;
	    document.getElementById("imagename").innerHTML = esperancejson.artifacts.images[0].name;
	    document.getElementById("imagedescription").innerHTML = esperancejson.artifacts.images[0].description;
    }
    </script>
</head>
<body onload="Initialise()">
    <div id="title">1</div>
    <div id="description">2</div>
    <img id="img" src="" />
    <div id="imagename">3</div>
    <div id="imagedescription">4</div>
</body>
</html>
```

Example Microformat Json (formatted):
```
{
"legal":{
},
"publisher":{
"id":"Fake_Publisher_Id",
"name":"Fake_Publisher",
"email":"Fake_Email",
"url":"Fake_WWW"
},
"microformat":{
"mfid":"B9889DB4-9D9A-4857-841B-CD5EB8E72FF0",
"mfname":"Photo Collection"
},
"artifacts":{
"title":"Collection Title",
"description":"Collection Description",
"images":[
{
"base64":"data:image/javascript;base64,",
"name":"Token Name 1",
"description":"Token Description 1"
}
]
}
}
```
